creator: khammond25@home.com
text:
Created attachment 776
Patch to fix NullPointerException

creator: khammond25@home.com
text:
[message regarding the patch]

Hello,

This is a I18N patch refered to Okamoto's patch
(I'm a member of Ja-Jakarta Project, too).

This patch fixed NullPointerException occuring
when removing ThreadGroup in Japanese environment
and I18Nd.

Regards,

--
HIGUCHI Akira
higuchi.akira@jri.co.jp
